scripts.test: echo '=> running tests' && npm run tsc && ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine-node spec && echo '=> tests passed'
scripts.minify:js: npm run minify:app && npm run minify:controllers && npm run minify:renderers && npm run minify:routes && npm run minify:models
scripts.minify:app: echo '=> minify:app' && uglifyjs ./*.js -o ./dist/js/app.min.js --source-map ./dist/js/app.js.map && echo '=> minify:app completed'
scripts.minify:controllers: echo '=> minify:controllers' && uglifyjs ./controllers/*.js -o ./dist/js/controllers.js --source-map ./dist/js/controllers.map && echo '=> minify:controllers completed'
scripts.minify:renderers: echo '=> minify:renderers' && uglifyjs ./renderers/*.js -o ./dist/js/renderers.js --source-map ./dist/js/renderers.map && echo '=> minify:renderers completed'
scripts.minify:routes: echo '=> minify:routes' && uglifyjs ./routes/*.js -o ./dist/js/routes.js --source-map ./dist/js/routes.map && echo '=> minify:routes completed'
scripts.minify:models: echo '=> minify:models' && uglifyjs ./models/*.js -o ./dist/js/models.js --source-map ./dist/js/models.js.map && echo '=> minify:models completed'
scripts.build: echo 'Running build....' && npm run clean && npm run tsc && npm run build:dir && npm run test && npm run minify:js
